<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">[Breath of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=29)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 322 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2)

**Bloodline**
[Phoenix](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=15)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** A living creature within range would die.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** the triggering creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your blessing revives a creature at the moment of its death. You prevent the target from dying and restore Hit Points to the target equal to 4d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. You can't use _breath of life_ if the triggering effect was [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) or a death effect.
name: Breath of Life
